TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PersonalizationProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection

Docs.summary: Stores references to objects indexed by name. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is used to store the default provider in the single-provider scenario. In multiple-provider scenarios, you can use this collection to choose a specific personalization provider at run time.
Personalization providers in the collection are indexed according to the name of each provider as set in the Web.config or the Machine.config configuration file using the [providers Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/51363b49-eafa-4b9c-b9d0-80086b385195) attribute.

Docs.param: The personalization provider to be added.
Docs.summary: Adds an instance of a class that implements to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this method to add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>-derived instances to the collection.

The location in the array at which to begin copying.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The array is an array of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> instances.

Docs.param: The name of the personalization provider.
Docs.summary: Gets a personalization provider based on the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Personalization providers in the collection are indexed according to the name of each provider, as set in the Web.config or Machine.config configuration files.
